title: A 4 year old girl fell out of a moving bus at Harrison, Arkansas
body:
It's unsure if the back emergency bus door was opened by her or if it was just unlocked, but she fell out of the movie on to the asphalt and the bus driver kept on going completely ignorant to what just happened.

Luckily right behind the bus a good couple meters back was a off duty firefighter and his wife immediately stopping to help the poor young girl and call for an ambulance.

She suffered a broken jaw and will require some surgery.

So... question...

... Why the hell don't buses have some sort of alarm to warn everyone on the bus that the back emergency door was opened/unlocked while the bus is still moving?
